verses.1: Sabbath ni a bei khit ciangin Magdala khuami Mary, James nu Mary le Salome-te in Jesuʼ luang a va zut nadingun paknamtui a va lei uh hi.
verses.2: Nipi ni zingsang tung nisuah phetin hanah a pai uh hi.
verses.3: Amaute khatlekhat kikum uh a, “Han kongvang hukna suangtum kuaʼn hong lik khiatsak ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
verses.4: Tua laitakin a khuadak uh leh a suangtum a kilik khia khin sa-in a mu uh hi. (Tua suangtum a gol mahmah khat ahi hi.)
verses.5: Han sungah a lut uh leh, a taklam pang uh ah, puan pak a silh tangval khat a tu mu uh a, lamdang sa-in a lau uh hi.
verses.6: Tua tangvalpa in, “Lamdang sa kei un. Singlamteh tungah a kithat Nazareth khuami Jesu na zong uh hi. Amah kithokiksak khin a, hih lai ah om nawn lo hi. Amah a kisialna mun hong en un.
verses.7: Tu-in pai unla, Peter le Jesuʼ nungzui dangte kiangah hih thu va gen un. Note tungah hong gen sa bangin Galilee gam amaute mai ah pai hi; tua lai ah amah na mu ding uh hi, ci hi, ci un,” a ci hi.
verses.8: Amaute in lamdang sa-in lau uh ahih manin han panin tai suak pah uh a, kuamah dang kiangah hih thu gen lo uh hi.
verses.9: (Sihna panin Jesu a thawhkik khit ciangin ama sung pan dawi sagih a hawl khiatna, Magdala khuami Mary tungah Nipi ni zingsang tungin kilang masa hi.
verses.10: Tua nu zong hong pai-in a dah a kapin a om Jesuʼ lawm luite kiangah hih thu a va gen hi.
verses.11: Ahi zongin Jesu a nuntakna thu le tua nu mahmah in a muh khitna thu a genna a zak uh hangin, a thugen um zo lo uh hi.)
verses.12: (Tua khit ciangin khuapi panin khuaneu ah nungzui nihte a pai laitakun amaute tungah a mel tuam khatin Jesu kilang hi.
verses.13: Hih tegel zong kilehkikin a lawm dangte uh kiangah gen uh a, ahi zongin amauʼ thugen, na um lo uh hi.)
verses.14: (Tua khit ciangin a tawpna ah, an a nek laitakun nungzui sawm le khatte mahmah kiangah a kilang hi. A kithawhkiksak khit ciangin amah a mu miteʼ thugen um lo uh ahih manin a lungkhauhna uh le a up lohna hangun amaute a taii hi.
verses.15: Tua khit ciangin amaute tungah, “Leitung khempeuh ah note pai kawikawi unla, mi khempeuh tungah Lungdamna Thu na hilh ta un.
verses.16: Lungdamna Thu umin tui a kiphum mi peuhpeuh in hotkhiatna ngah dinga, a um lo mi peuhpeuh in mawhsakna thuak ding uh hi.
verses.17: A um mite tungah hih vangliatna limte kipia ding hi: Keima hangin dawi hawl khia thei ding uh a, pau dangte pau thei ding uh hi.
verses.18: Gul a lawn hangun bangmah ci lo ding uh a, gu tui a dawn hangun zong bangmah ci lo ding uh hi. Cinate tungah a khut uh nga ding uh a, cinate dam ding uh hi,” a ci hi.)
verses.19: (Tua bangin Topa Jesu in amaute tungah thu a gen khit ciangin vantungah kila to-in Pasianʼ tak lamah a tu hi.
verses.20: Nungzuite zong mun khempeuh ah pai-in thu a hilh uh hi. Topa in zong amauteʼ nasep seppih a, a thuhilhnate uh man hi, ci-in a lahna-in amaute tungah vangliatna limte a pia hi.)
